app.title: EN Applications for: {job_title} {job_classification}
get_priority_list: EN Contact Talent Cloud to get a list of priorities that applied to this position. They must be reviewed and considered first.
underConsideration.description: EN Review the applicants in the Veterans and Canadian Citizens section. If none or very few of these applicants meet the requirements, you can still consider non- candian - citizen applications in the Optional Consideration section
underConsideration.title: EN Under Consideration
optionalConsideration.title: EN Optional Consideration
optionalConsideration.description: EN In this group you will find the applicants who are not Canadian Citizens or do not claim to meet the essential criteria.
screenedOut.title: EN No Longer Under Consideration
screenedOut.description: EN These applications have allready been screened out.
screenOutAll: EN Screen All Optional Candidates Out
priorityApplicants.title: EN Priority Applicants
priorityApplicants.description: EN These are priority applicants for this position. They must be reviewed and considered first.
veteransAndCitizens.title: EN Veterans and Canadian Citizens
nonCitizens.title: EN Non-Canadian Citizens
essentialCriteriaFail.title: EN Don't Meet Essential Criteria
toggleAccordion: EN Toggle this step to view relevant applicants.
viewApplication.title: EN View this applicant's application.
viewProfile.title: EN View this applicant's profile.
backToApplicantList: EN < Save and Go Back to Applicant List
